capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's definitely the boy who lived, and it's incredible to think about all he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world from birth just because of a lightning-shaped scar on your forehead? It's no wonder he had so many challenges ahead of him.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's like a symbol of hope for many people, especially in the wizarding world. I mean, who wouldn't want to be "the boy who lived" after all? It's an incredible feeling to have that kind of power and responsibility on your shoulders. And let me tell you, he's definitely proven himself time and time again as a brave and selfless hero.
